name: Kyubu Kyubu Dice (DEMO)
description:
Note: Be sure to activate Full-Screen mode as the game is currently set at a 1920x1080 screen resolution.    

Kyubu Kyubu Dice is an Action Puzzle Game featuring Teresa-chan, the magical witch girl. She is responsible of solving the puzzles that roam the "Kyubu Kyubu Island", using her magical necklace known as "Kyubu Kyubu Dice"! With her powers she must uncover the secrets of this misterious place!

Inspired by classic japanese puzzle games, Kyubu Kyubu Dice challenges you to think about objects in different spatially oriented ways, by rolling the "Kyubu Kyubu Dice" the player must clear the panels that appear on the stage, but beware! As the game progresses, the panels spawn faster and faster, it can soon get quite frenetic!

With an intricate Combo Chain System skilled players can make the most of their playthroughs making sure no each session stays the same in this fast-paced puzzle experience.

Carry around this game wherever you go, as it's soon going to be available for free on Android and iOS mobile devices, and it can be played in both portrait and landscape orientations! With more content and more game modes to play around and have fun with!

As a solo developer I really hope you get to enjoy this demo. I spend a lot of time playing it on my smartphone, and to be quite honest, I'm quite addicted to it myself.

I'll work hard to make this a game that puzzle fans can enjoy and have a good time with just as much as I do when I play it, and add more content such as more original artwork, more characters, among many other stuff.

You can follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/KyubuKyubuDice
